desc.p: Submit a log entry for the geocache. Please note, that you won't be able to use this method until you learn to handle OAuth.

req.name: logtype
req.p: Type of an entry. This should be one of: Found it, Didn't find it or Comment.

opt.name: comment
opt.p: Text to be submitted with the log entry. Plain-text (no HTML).

opt.name: when
opt.p: A date and time string, in any reasonable format (any acceptable by PHP's strtotime function, ISO 8601 preffered).
Indicates when the cache was found. If given, the log will be published with the given date and time. If not, log will be published using the current date and time.

opt.name: password
opt.p: Some caches require a password in order to submit a "Found it" log entry. You may check if this cache requires password with req_passwd field of the services/caches/geocache method.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: success - true, if the log entry was submitted successfully,
message - plain-text string, a message which acknowledges success or describes an error (some comments may be rejected),
log_uuid - ID of the newly created log entry, or null in case of an error.
